abstract: Stocks rise, propelled by climbing oil prices.

headline.print_headline: Oil Prices and Market Keep Moving  in Tandem, With Both Surging
headline.main: Market Advances, Following Rise in Price of Oil

snippet: Stocks moved higher, building on a modest climb the day before. Investors kept a close eye on the price of oil, which was lower early in the day.
lead_paragraph: Stocks moved higher, building on a modest climb the day before. Investors kept a close eye on the price of oil, which was lower early in the day.
